1.1.0.name: wordpress/buzzwords
1.1.0.description:
Buzzwords: Tooltip & Link

Very usefull for posts with static informations, which are often used in your blog:

  • Certain Sight
  • Personal Profile
  • Certain Description

Just add one or more associates Buzzwords for this Post once and check other posts of your blog.

Everywhere the defined Buzzwords are appearing in the plain text, they will converted to a Link to the related article automatically. The Buzzword will have also a Tooltip with title/description.

See also Wiki for Tooltip

You will avoid repeating in case of you are using ongoing certain subjects in the blog and reduce the navigation on site.

Buzzwords Plugin for WordPress gives possibility to link selected articles through the Buzzwords from any post of your WP blog automatically. You describe certain things just once
